class.name: GDCubismEffectCustom
class.description: By placing it as a child element of xref:./gd_cubism_user_model.adoc[], you can extend your own functions.

signal.name: cubism_epilogue
signal.description: Called when the Live2D model is drawn.

signal.name: cubism_init
signal.description: Called at the start of using the Live2D model. Normally it is only called once, but there is a possibility that a signal will occur again under the following conditions. - When a new Live2D model is loaded. - When _GDCubismEffect*_ is added or removed as a child element of the Live2D model.

signal.name: cubism_process
signal.description: Called when the Live2D model is drawn.

signal.name: cubism_prologue
signal.description: Called when the Live2D model is drawn.

signal.name: cubism_term
signal.description: Called at the end of using the Live2D model. Normally it is only called once, but there is a possibility that a signal will occur again under the following conditions. - When a new Live2D model is loaded. - When _GDCubismEffect*_ is added or removed as a child element of the Live2D model.
